name: Last Jump - A Hyper Casual Game
name_original: Last Jump - A Hyper Casual Game
description:
Play Top Game in the list of Hyper Casual Games. Remember your retro days and play for hours like never before.

High pixel exciting adventure of the Ball Jump and slide through the platforms. Can you react fast enough? Your path is being built in real time with an exciting combination of platforms. 

Easy to pick up and play. Collect coins to unlock new characters and play with their new powers. The more you play the more you learn. Jumping on platforms has never been so challenging  before.

two-tap double jump game. Easy to learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive game-play mechanics. See platforms built in real time right in front of you.
 
There is no rooms for give-ups  so do you dare to play?

DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE!!
